TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProfileGroupBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对分组的 ASP.NET 配置文件属性值的非类型化访问。

span.span: Provides untyped access to grouped ASP.NET profile property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用类来创建中的分组的属性属性当前。The class is used by ASP.NET to create grouped properties in the property for the current . 属性指定为一组使用的属性时[（ASP.NET 设置架构） profile 的 properties 的 group 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e)，ASP.NET 使用强类型化访问器的每个属性组中创建新的类。When properties are specified as a group of properties using the [group Element for properties for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e), ASP.NET creates a new class with strongly typed accessors for each property in the group. 新类继承基类。The new class inherits the base class. 新的类调用的强类型化访问器并方法的基类，以检索并分别将配置文件设置属性值。The strongly typed accessors of the new class call the and methods of the base class to retrieve and set profile property values, respectively. 传递调用以获取和设置属性值的类，继承类提供给方法的类。The passes calls to get and set property values to the class that inherits the class that is supplied to the method of the class. 请参阅行为、 异常和等等的详细信息的类。See the class for more information on behaviors, exceptions, and so on. 此类不适于在代码中创建。This class is not intended to be created from your code. ## Examples 以下 Web.config 文件指定用户配置文件，其中包含一组属性组名称为`Address`。The following Web.config file specifies a user profile that contains a group of properties with a group name of `Address`. 为生成的分组的属性属性与当前组名称，例如，将前面`Profile.Address.Street`。The grouped properties generated for the property of the current will be preceded by the group name, for example, `Profile.Address.Street`. 第二个示例演示用于存储和检索配置的配置文件属性的 ASP.NET 页。The second example shows an ASP.NET page that stores and retrieves the configured profile properties. ```xml ``` 下面的代码示例显示了在 ASP.NET 页面读取，并设置为用户配置文件指定的分组的属性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用类，以创建中的分组的属性属性当前。ASP.NET uses the class to create grouped properties in the property for the current . 属性指定为一组使用的属性时[（ASP.NET 设置架构） profile 的 properties 的 group 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e)元素中，ASP.NET 使用强类型化访问器的每个属性组中创建新的类。When properties are specified as a group of properties using the [group Element for properties for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e) element, ASP.NET creates a new class with strongly typed accessors for each property in the group. 新类继承基类。The new class inherits the base class. 此类不适于在代码中创建。This class is not intended to be created from your code. ## Examples 以下 Web.config 文件指定用户配置文件，其中包含一组属性组名称为`Address`。The following Web.config file specifies a user profile that contains a group of properties with a group name of `Address`. 为生成的分组的属性属性与当前组名称，例如，将前面`Profile.Address.Street`。The grouped properties generated for the property of the current will be preceded by the group name, for example, `Profile.Address.Street`. ``` ``` 以下 ASP.NET 页面读取并设置为用户配置文件指定的分组的属性。The following ASP.NET page reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). param.span: 分组配置文件属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the grouped profile property.

summary.span: 获取分组配置文件属性的值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用类，以创建用户配置文件的类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建新的类的类型`ProfileCommon`，后者又继承类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型化访问器添加到`ProfileCommon`每个组和属性中定义的类[profile 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd)配置节。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each group and property defined in the [profile Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd) configuration section. 强类型化访问器`ProfileCommon`类调用方法来检索从非类型化的值生成访问器，然后将强制转换为指定类型和分组的属性值的形式返回。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the method to retrieve untyped values from the that the generated accessor then casts as the specified type and returns as the grouped property value. 可以使用方法来按名称检索你的应用程序的用户配置文件的分组的属性值。You can use the method to retrieve grouped property values of the user profile for your application by name. 返回的值被类型化为`object`并且必须强制转换为特定对象类型时检索。Returned values are typed as `object` and must be cast as the specific object type when retrieved. 有关配置文件属性值对的强类型访问，您可以分组的属性按名称访问作为一组的成员属性，例如， `Profile.Address.City`。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the grouped property by name as a member of a group of the property, for example, `Profile.Address.City`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了在 ASP.NET 页面读取，并设置为用户配置文件指定的分组的属性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. 指定的 Web.config 文件的示例分组为用户配置文件的属性，请参阅为提供的示例类。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies grouped properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于检索或设置为应用程序的用户配置文件的分组的属性值。You can use this property to retrieve or set grouped property values of the user profile for your application. 返回的值被类型化为并且必须强制转换为特定对象类型时检索。Returned values are typed as and must be cast as the specific object type when retrieved. 强类型化访问配置文件属性值，您可以将属性按名称访问作为一组的成员属性，例如， `Profile.Address.City`。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the property by name as a member of a group of the property, for example, `Profile.Address.City`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了在 ASP.NET 页面读取，并设置为用户配置文件指定的分组的属性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. 在配置文件中指定的一组属性的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅为提供的示例类。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies a group of properties in the profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用类，以创建用户配置文件使用的类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建新的类的类型`ProfileCommon`，后者又继承类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型化访问器添加到`ProfileCommon`每个组和属性中定义的类[profile 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd)配置节。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each group and property defined in the [profile Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd) configuration section. 强类型化访问器`ProfileCommon`类调用方法来传递分组的属性值复制到要存储在数据源。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the method to pass grouped property values to the to be stored at the data source. 可以使用方法将值分配给按名称分组的应用程序的用户配置文件属性。You can use the method to assign values to grouped properties of the user profile for your application by name. 值被类型化为`object,`和类型检查都在运行时，不编译时间。Values are typed as `object,` and type checking will be done at run time, not compile time. 有关配置文件属性值对的强类型访问，您可以分组的属性按名称访问作为一组的成员属性，例如， `Profile.Address.City`。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the grouped property by name as a member of a group of the property, for example, `Profile.Address.City`. ## Examples 以下 ASP.NET 页面读取并设置为用户配置文件指定的分组的属性。The following ASP.NET page reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. 指定的 Web.config 文件的示例分组为用户配置文件的属性，请参阅为提供的示例类。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies grouped properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
